title: Confirm current UI state is not the initial design

requirements.text: Verify that the current UI state (version 35) does not match the original/initial application design, and document the remaining differences between the current implementation and the true initial state that existed before any mockup-matching work began.
acceptanceCriteria: A clear identification of UI elements that still differ from the original design
Documentation of what the true initial state looked like for key components (Header, HomePage, HeroSection, CivicSenseAnimation, ReportIssueDialog, theme configuration)
Confirmation that version 35 is not the target initial state

constraints: Do not make further UI changes until the true initial design state is confirmed
Maintain all data persistence and backend logic
nonGoals: Making additional UI restoration changes without clear direction
Assuming the current state is correct
